title: Are there any books that explain the purpose of life? - Quora

response.answer_text: There isn't any “best book” so for which you read and understand straightway the purpose of your life. It's a continuous process of observing all the aspects of life. To find your life purpose, first you have to let go of all the patterns that have gotten in its way for years. Every time we ask ourselves, “What should I be doing right now?” we are letting the Protector dominate our lives. I would like to share few of them which helped me immensely to enhance my observation skills- A New Earth- Awakening to Your Life's Purpose by ECKHART TOLLEFlow - The Psychology of Optimal Experience by MIHALY CSIKZENTMIHALYI **The Creativity Habit by TWYLA THARPMan's Search for Meaning by VIKTOR FRANKLShrimad Bhagavad-Gita ( GEM of All BOOKS ever Written)The Holy Bible- A Must Read

Yes. Lord of the rings. Read it… after reading it think: Did I enjoy it?Was it fascinating and exciting?Do I feel like I haven't wasted my time?If you get 3 YES, you have just lived your life as you should. Stay curious, don't stop wondering. Enjoy. P.s. a lot of other books and hobbies work the same. It is a personal preference to be honest. And one of the most exciting thing is to share the happiness and knowledge with others. Good luck.

There is an ancient Wisdom, practical science that is only focused on helping people to find and fulfill their Human purpose in life. And all the authentic books of this Wisdom are about explaining our purpose, while also giving us the tools for achieving it. The Mission Of The Wisdom Of Kabbalah | Laitman.com

Quran offers a fantastic set of rules and SOP in conjunction with hadith books. There are exhaustive Dos and Donts. A PERSON IS THE BEST JUDGE OF HOW DOES HE/SHE DESIRES TO GO ABOUT IT. No other book is going to guide so elegantly and sincerely. There are people who do not want to follow religion, any religion. They are humbly requested to kindly ignore the answer. It is not for them.
